Just one day after performing at the Tony Awards, Hugh Jackman has revealed he has tested positive for COVID-19 yet again.

articles.author: Jamie Phillips, Jonathan Rose
articles.title: Oscar-winner Kevin Spacey, 62, will appear at UK court on Thursday charged with four sex attacks - Daily Mail
articles.description: Spacey, 62, is accused of four counts of sexual assault against three men between 2005 and 2013 in London and Gloucestershire after a probe was launched in 2017.
articles.content:
Kevin Spacey has landed in the UK ahead of a court appearance on Thursday after being charged with four counts of sexual assault against three men in London and Gloucestershire.
